name: Kudos Web
description:
Kudos Web has been delivering significant websites NZ wide (including Auckland and Wellington) since 2000. We take care of large web-related projects with a focus on the business of communicating.
We deliver the most value to large public sector and NFP (i.e. clients in the commercial and education sectors) - clients who need a strong, long-term, manageable solution as well as an amazing experience online for their target audience.
